post:
Hello,

We have quite some spare /22s available with us which we have decided to put on a lease. Most of these blocks were listed by some of our clients in SBL. Although we have some clean ranges available too.

Asking Price - 

$1500 per /22 block per year(For SBL)

$4000 per /22 block per year(For Non SBL).

If buying in bulk:

$1000 per /22 block per year if buying 4 or more.
$3000 per /22 block per year if buying 2 or more.

If there is anyone interested you can reach us on skype - serverbells.

Thanks & Regards
